title: The Shawshank Redemption
desc: JavaScript is a high-level, interpreted programming language. It is a language which is also characterized as dynamic, weakly typed, prototype-based and multi-parthic. It is most commonly used as a part of web browsers, but it can also be used in server-side JavaScript, embedded in HTML, and as a scripting language for various runtime environments, including JVM, Node.js, and browsers.
